short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamically check the number of words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs in the selected area.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can dynamically obtain statistics on selected texts.

Scouter offers a whole new experience for getting text statistics. It tells you the number of words, characters, lines, and paragraphs in the selected text. You can dynamically check them with badges by selecting the ones you use most often. Others can be checked from POPUP. The counted text is not provided to outside parties and the user's privacy is protected.
